operations.notes:
This operation creates a Broadcast campaign and returns a broadcastId. To see the status of this campaign call GetBroadcast with the returned broadcastId.

There are 3 types of Broadcast: TEXT, IVR, or VOICE. Select the appropriate config to match the broadcast type, TextBroadcastConfig, IvrBroadcastConfig, or VoiceBroadcastConfig. Prefer the Text Service operations (ex: SendText) and Call Service operations (ex: SendCall) over this operation when managing simple text and call campaigns since those operations are simpler and more concise.

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: Unique ID of web request to de-dup on

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: E.164 11 digit number or short code

parameters.name: LocalRestrictBegin
parameters.description: Earliest time a client can be contacted in the timezone associated with the number's NPA/NXX

parameters.name: LocalRestrictEnd
parameters.description: Latest time a client can be contacted in the timezone associated with the number's NPA/NXX

parameters.name: RetryPhoneTypes
parameters.description: Phone types to call in retry

parameters.name: AnsweringMachineConfig
parameters.description: Action to take if machine answers

parameters.name: LiveSoundId
parameters.description: ID of Sound to play if call answered by live person

parameters.name: MachineSoundId
parameters.description: ID of Sound to play if call answered by machine

parameters.name: TransferSoundId
parameters.description: ID of Sound to play if call transfered

parameters.name: TransferDigit
parameters.description: Phone digit call transfers on if pressed

parameters.name: DncSoundId
parameters.description: Do Not Call unique ID of sound

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: E.164 11 digit number or short code

parameters.name: LocalRestrictBegin
parameters.description: Earliest time a client can be contacted in the timezone associated with the number's NPA/NXX

parameters.name: LocalRestrictEnd
parameters.description: Latest time a client can be contacted in the timezone associated with the number's NPA/NXX

parameters.name: RetryPhoneTypes
parameters.description: Phone types to call in retry

parameters.name: Message
parameters.description: 160 char or less message to be sent in text broadcast. Use rented 'keyword' in message if need response

parameters.name: BigMessageStrategy
parameters.description: Set strategy if message is over 160 chars (default: SEND_MULTIPLE)

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: E.164 11 digit number or short code

parameters.name: LocalRestrictEnd
parameters.description: Latest time a client can be contacted in the timezone associated with the number's NPA/NXX

parameters.name: RetryPhoneTypes
parameters.description: Phone types to call in retry

operations.notes: Use this operation to see the status of Broadcasts in account. Filter by type of campaign whether currently running. Returns a list of Broadcast info such as campaign name, type, status, ect...

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: Max number of results to return limited to 1000 (default: 1000)

parameters.name: LabelName
parameters.description: Label that result must have to be included

apis.description: Gets a single Broadcast by ID

operations.summary: Gets a single Broadcast by ID
operations.notes: Use ID returned from CreateBroadcast or from QueryBroadcast to retreive information on indivual Broadcast. Include info such as campaign name, type, status, ect...

Update existing broadcast's configuration such as time zone restrictions or retry logic. Currently all fields from config are updated so the 'Message' field needs to be populated just like in CreateBroadcast operation.

Use unique ID to specify broadcast. Need to provide dummy 'Name' field Broadcast even though the field will not be overwritten.

apis.description: Gets performance and result statistics for a Broadcast

operations.summary: Gets performance and result statistics for a Broadcast
operations.notes: Get broadcast stats by broadcastId or by interval range. Stats include information like billed amount, billed duration, actions count, attempt count, etc...

parameters.name: IntervalBegin
parameters.description: Beginning of DateTime interval to search on

parameters.name: IntervalEnd
parameters.description: End of DateTime interval to search on

apis.description: Starts, Stops or Archives a Broadcast

operations.summary: Starts, Stops or Archives a Broadcast
operations.notes: Apply command START, STOP, or ARCHIVE to Broadcast. Also can change the max active count of Broadcast.

Contact Batch is a list of contacts to associate with a broadcast. Use this operation to attach a list of contacts to an existing Campaign. A list of ToNumbers or an existing Contact List ID is required to create and attach the Contact List. Returned is the unique contactListId that can be used in ControlContactBatch to enable or disable this batch.

parameters.name: To
parameters.description: List of E.164 11 digit numbers space or comma separated

operations.notes: Return list of Contact Batches associated with this Broadcast. The contactBatchIds returned from this campaign can then be used to enable, disable, or delete the individual Batches.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: Max number of results to return limited to 1000 (default: 1000)

operations.notes: Retrieve info on individual Contact Batch using contactId returned from CreateContactBatch

apis.description: Enables or Disables a Broadcast's ContactBatch

operations.summary: Enables or Disables a Broadcast's ContactBatch
operations.notes: This operation provides the ability to enable or disable on a Broadcast the list of contacts associated with a ContactBatch.

apis.description: Creates a new Schedule for a Broadcast

operations.summary: Creates a new Schedule for a Broadcast
operations.notes: Broadcast can be set to run at scheduled times a prescribed by BroadcastSchedule. Can pick start time, stop time, begin date, and day of week. Returns broadcastScheduleId that can be used in GetBroadcastSchedule and DeleteBroadcastSchedule

parameters.name: StartTimeOfDay
parameters.description: Earliest time a client can be contacted in the timezone associated with the number's NPA/NXX

parameters.name: StopTimeOfDay
parameters.description: Latest time a client can be contacted in the timezone associated with the number's NPA/NXX

operations.notes: List information about Broadcast Schedules attached to a Broadcast.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: Max number of results to return limited to 1000 (default: 1000)

operations.notes: List information about individual Broadcast Schedule attached to a Broadcast.
